species.name: blitzle
descriptions: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

abilities.name: lightning-rod
abilities.effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pok√©mon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

abilities.name: motor-drive
abilities.effect: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.
